content.raw: Also, I just realized that we’re introducing new discovery messages. If we mix a node running this version and another one running the previous version, everything should work, but the node running the previous version is going to start showing [this error message](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/69a261c33cf8442ae94f409025a1f8ac4b9a6b2e/include/ignition/transport/Discovery.hh#lines-1013) all over the place. Not sure if we still need to fix this patch in transport7 or we can patch it on `default`.
content.html: Also, I just realized that we’re introducing new discovery messages. If we mix a node running this version and another one running the previous version, everything should work, but the node running the previous version is going to start showing this error message all over the place. Not sure if we still need to fix this patch in transport7 or we can patch it on default.
